entry.title: Sunday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
